|brand = Sharp |model = DHUB-SP1 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = September 27, 2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Sharp_DHUB-SP1 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = (non-standard connector) |formfactor = module
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = NKR-SP1 |icid = 4441A-SP1 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 60:02:B4, BC:30:7D
|chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43242;BCM43242KFFBG, TN1324 P11, 297429 P3T W; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/27/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00NVPBQA4 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This module is used with various Sharp TVs, possibly including... *LC-60UD27U *LC-70LE757U *LC-70UQ17U *LC-80SQ15U
Various PNs on the module include DHUB-SP1, RCPSHDH13-2254, and RUNTKB222WJN1.
*"48DHUB03.0GA" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This device is using BCM43242KFFBG.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
